title: Error in Census Income Classification (sklearn) notebook
body:
When I run this cell 
```
shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X_valid.iloc[0:1000,:], nsamples=1000)
```
I get this error:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
IndexError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-20-3ff222894f79> in <module>()
----> 1 shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X_valid.iloc[0:1000,:], nsamples=1000)
      2 #shap.force_plot(explainer.expected_value, shap_values, X_valid.iloc[0:1000,:])

~/.local/share/virtualenvs/zSMGRzHl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/kernel.py in shap_values(self, X, **kwargs)
    207                 if self.keep_index:
    208                     data = convert_to_instance_with_index(data, column_name, index_value[i:i + 1], index_name)
--> 209                 explanations.append(self.explain(data, **kwargs))
    210 
    211             # vector-output

~/.local/share/virtualenvs/zSMGRzHl/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/kernel.py in explain(self, incoming_instance, **kwargs)
    360                 while samples_left > 0:
    361                     mask.fill(0.0)
--> 362                     ind = ind_set[ind_set_pos] # we call np.random.choice once to save time and then just read it here
    363                     ind_set_pos += 1
    364                     subset_size = ind + num_full_subsets + 1

IndexError: index 230 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 230
```
